entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Orangeville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:02 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.5°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Temperature rising to plus 4 this evening then steady.
entry.summary: A few rain showers and drizzle ending before morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Temperature rising to plus 4 this evening then steady. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
